content: I'm still unsure about making a living from fiction writing, but I think I need to try it out and see where it takes me. I'm willing to put in the time and effort to develop my craft and see if I can produce quality work. I've already started writing short stories and experimenting with different styles, so I think the next step is to take an online course or attend a writing workshop to learn more about the industry and get feedback on my work. Do you think it's a good idea to focus on a specific genre, like fantasy or romance, or should I try to write across different genres?
